The elephant is a symbol of strength, wisdom and majesty in many cultures.
The symbolic value of the elephant has been traced back to the use of the tusk as a symbol of royalty and power.
The symbol has been used throughout history to represent various ideas, including prosperity, royalty, and deity.
The symbol has also been used to represent various emotions, such as grief, love, and happiness.
The symbol can be used to represent various ideas, such as freedom, peace, and beauty.
